# Creating Trajectories {.unnumbered}

## Trajectory Model

The back trajectories were calculated using the NOAA Hysplit version 5 model described by @steinNOAAHYSPLITAtmospheric2015. The model was run on gaia, a 32-processor Linux workstation at Washington State University.

## Model Setup

[Here](https://www.ready.noaa.gov/hysplitusersguide/S000.htm) are the instructions for how to setup and run a Hysplit back trajectory.
